description.narrative:
Diakonia har ansökt om finansiering av egeninsats om 726 670 SEK för EU-projektet "Development Initiative for Northern Uganda (DINU)" under 2020-2021.
Insatsen syftar till att:
1. "Enhance Gender Responsive Accountability and Citizen Empowerment (GRACE) in Alebtong and Amolatar Districts of Northern Uganda."
2. "Strengthen the capacity of communities and Non-State Actors to participate in local governance, prioritize Gender Responsive planning and Budgeting and joint service delivery monitoring in Alebtong and Amolatar Districts of Northern Uganda."
Projektet kommer att genomföras på lokal nivå i Uganda och Diakonia kommer att arbeta i samverkan med civilsamhällesorganisationen The Civil Society Budget Advocacy Group (CSBAG). Diakonia är huvudsökande organisation och har det övergripande ansvaret för projektets implementering och koordinering.
Den aktuella insatsen har EU-kommissionens referensnummer FED 2019-412-819. Insatsen har en total budget på 266 667 EUR, vilket motsvarar cirka 2 809 590 SEK. Av detta har Diakonia beviljats 200 000 EUR från EU-kommissionen och ansöker om 726 670 SEK (cirka 25%) från Sida.

Diakonia has applied to Sida for funding of 726 670 SEK to carry out the EU-project "Development Initiative for Northern Uganda (DINU)" during 2020-2021.
The project aims to:
1. "Enhance Gender Responsive Accountability and Citizen Empowerment (GRACE) in Alebtong and Amolatar Districts of Northern Uganda."
2. "Strengthen the capacity of communities and Non-State Actors to participate in local governance, prioritize Gender Responsive planning and Budgeting and joint service delivery monitoring in Alebtong and Amolatar Districts of Northern Uganda."
The project will be conducted on a local level in Uganda and Diakonia will collaborate with the civil society organisation "The Civil Society Budget Advocacy Group" (CSBAG). Diakonia is lead applicant to Sida and has the overall responsibility for the coordination and implementation of the project.
The contribution has the EU Commission reference number: FED 2019-412-819. The contribution's total budget is 266 667 EUR, which corresponds to approximately 2 809 590 SEK. The requested support from Sida is 726 670 SEK, which corresponds to 25% of the total budget.

tag.narrative: 16.7 - Ensure responsive, inclusive, participatory and representative decision-making at all levels.
16.7 - Säkerställa ett lyhört, inkluderande, deltagandebaserat och representativt beslutsfattande på alla nivåer.
5.1 - Avskaffa alla former av diskriminering av alla kvinnor och flickor överallt
5.1 - End all forms of discrimination against all women and girls everywhere.
5.5 - Ensure women’s full and effective participation and equal opportunities for leadership at all levels of decision-making in political, economic and public life.
5.5 - Tillförsäkra kvinnor fullt och faktiskt deltagande och lika möjligheter till ledarskap på alla beslutsnivåer i det politiska, ekonomiska och offentliga livet.
